text: Koshanam is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 18 km from Gobichettipalayam and 53 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Nambiyur. Koshanam has a population of about 7397. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Koshanam
